c74object.name: bl.genlist
c74object.digest: Generate a list as a range of integers
c74object.description: Generates a list of integer numbers with the first argument being the bottom of the range and the second being the top. Both numbers are included in the list.

outlet.digest: List: the generated list between the two numbers.

objarg.name: range-start
objarg.digest: The start of the range. Will be the first number on the list.

objarg.name: range-end
objarg.digest: The end of the range. Will be the last number on the list.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Bang to output the generated list.
method.description: Bang to output the generated list. The numbers provided as arguments will be included as the first and last elements in the list.
